alert.note: Alert for Iberville (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:51PM CDT until September 07 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Iberville Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge, or 8 miles southeast of Krotz Springs, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ramah. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 128 and 135. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
